author: Ahmed Ghareeb
title: ADALancer
description: Existing freelancer marketplaces struggle with high fees and low payments as well as delivering consistent quality of work

assessments.note: This proposal appears to adequately address the challenge although there are potentially a number of barriers that may require further attention.
This proposal, if implemented, can serve underserved freelancing markets while providing lower fees and thus has the potential to drive adoption.
This is a complete proposal plan and concept to deliver an UpWork like solution for Cardano.

Good solution to a nightmare of a problem in the current world in doing this type of freelance work. I think a lot more people would get into freelance if there was no centralized host that took 30% revenue (which is crazy!)

The author has IT experience but I would like to have seen further evidence of team building as this appears to be a complex build including many facets that will require expert professionals. I do note that preliminary collaborations are underway and await the outcome of same.
Because the proposal is missing a detailed budget, verifiable proposer info, and the team is not yet formed, a high score for likely success is unwarranted at this point.
The proposal plan, timeline and outlined deliverables are complete and its likely they will be implemented successfully.

Would be nice to have some evidence of experience (LinkedIn?). Only a placeholder website provided. A key component to this working is the dispute resolution. How will smart contracts solve this? They are only as good as the data going in? Where does this come from, how is it validated? The dispute panel could quickly become overwhelmed and 3% fee may be nowhere near enough to cover this.
From what I can tell there is a single experienced developer to work on this. That is great but I think given the scope of the project it would be beneficial to look into having a team of people.

This proposal does provide a reasonably solid depiction of what the proposer would like to achieve. I would like further information or a breakdown of the many moving parts to be provided. I do feel that with further team building and refinement that this proposal could be effective.
The information provided is insufficient to audit the progress and the success of the proposal.
Even if all technical hurdles are addressed, what is the marketing plan? How will you build a user base of businesses and contractors?

I believe the project will be successful my only concern at this time is the timeline of how long it will take to accomplish. The details and roadmap are great. The website is also a nice touch and I will be keeping an eye on this to see how it is coming along.

solution: Create a decentralized freelancer marketplace using Cardano blockchain that offers instance payment, low fees and fair dispute settlement
experience: I have more than 20 years in IT development and Architecture including the blockchain technology and adoption.
